Author: Alex7
Title: [ANN] [ICO] INDIGO The FIRST MOTORSPORT Blockchain-Supported Project
Body: We are discussing the possibility to make Formula Indigo a supporting racing series for Formula E, it means our race will take place at the same streets the same weekend but at different time, before the Formula E races, for example

Author: Alex7
Title: [ANN] [ICO] INDIGO The FIRST MOTORSPORT Blockchain-Supported Project
Body: Electric racing cars not only eco-friendly and clean: no emission, no pollution, but also, NO NOISE ! That's why all the racing tracks are usually somewhere far from the city centre. With electric car racing we can bring it closer to people, because the noise wouldn't interrupt anybody

Title: [ANN] [ICO] INDIGO The FIRST MOTORSPORT Blockchain-Supported Project
Body: it is absolutely true! you could even organize circuits inside the city without anyone being disturbed by the noise. I imagine a circuit of electric machines that leak without giving any noise ... it must be surreal! I hope this project takes the flight!!!!!

Author: Alex7
Title: [ANN] [ICO] INDIGO The FIRST MOTORSPORT Blockchain-Supported Project
Body: You are a kind of person that we appeal to, my friend ! Talking about electric auto sport, we are at the very beginning. Being a pioneer is awesome, especially because we combine our passion, which is racing, and very innovative sphere of business, which is electric cars production. By the way, have you seen the latest update on our project? In November our business team is going to China, to hold a meeting with the representatives of Chinese electric car manufacturer. The supply of electric motors for our Formula Indigo will be discussed. After that, we will be able to make an official statement. I guess in December.

Body: I am one of the supporters of the Indigo ICO in this forum because I believe that they are really into something. Now, am getting myself always updated with the latest happenings in the project. Hopefully, by December we will finally know some details about the make-up of the coming electric racing car. That would be an excited thing to watch for.

Author: Alex7
Title: [ANN] [ICO] INDIGO The FIRST MOTORSPORT Blockchain-Supported Project
Body: Understanding, wisdom, knowledge: these things bring us closer to the bright Future for all the people in the world. One of the most important things in this Future is clean-technology. Without it our planet will not survive. Success of our project depends on how many people with VISION and WISDOM will contribute ! No matter the result, it is my pleasure to go together with you, my friend, because you are one of those people!

Author: CryptoBry
Title: [ANN] [ICO] INDIGO The FIRST MOTORSPORT Blockchain-Supported Project
Body: In the past many years, the GREEN trend has been very visible in the marketplace. The message is quite clear: let's help Mother Earth by inventing new ways of doing things and by using less pollution-maker products. The electric car for racing fits into this category and am sure that many enthusiasts would appreciate the idea. Good luck to the whole team.

Author: Alex7
Title: [ANN] [ICO] INDIGO The FIRST MOTORSPORT Blockchain-Supported Project
Body: Have you seen any of Formula E races? They usually take place on the city streets, some beautifull urban locations in the biggest megapolises like London, Hong-Kong, Paris. Formula 1 fans usually say that Formula E cars are to slow,that's why they never compete on the same tracks with F1, but this is not true. Our team discussed this with Firmula E officials, and they said that the races take place on the streets to be closer to people, to the city, and promote electric cars in the natural city conditions

Author: monica69
Title: [ANN] [ICO] INDIGO The FIRST MOTORSPORT Blockchain-Supported Project
Body: Indigo Racing Organization is building the first in the world entry-level electric racing car that will form series of competitions around the world as supporting racing series for Formula E. they want to become one of the major makers of electric open wheel single seater (Formula) cars that will be in great demand in the nearest future. they are working on a Formula-type electric racing car. Simple, safe, fast and affordable. Will develop one make racing series based on our car - the Formula Indigo! They are going to promote our car and competitions as preparatory series for top racing like the Formula E. As integral part of the plan, we will offer preparatory racing courses which will be available together with our own system of license and rating based on the blockchain technology.   We are proud to be the first in the world to make: Junior electric racing Formula car. Eco-friendly racing available for both professionals and amateurs alike. Blockchain-based system of racing licensing and rating.   you can have more information here https://www.indigoracing.org/

Author: Alex7
Title: [ANN] [ICO] INDIGO The FIRST MOTORSPORT Blockchain-Supported Project
Body: You are right, my friends ! The reason why we appeal to cryptocurrency community is that we believe, that you are the most progressive part of humanity ! You support and use one of the most innovative things in the world - crypto currencies ! We are coming from innovative part of Motorsport - Electric Motorsport, this is because we not only love racing but we also care about the future of our planet! So if you support us, we together can make the future better.
